original_title: Freddy: Si yo puedo tú puedes
overview: Freddy was born without legs and with only one arm in a humble Colombian neighborhood. At only 13, whether on his skateboard or surfing, Freddy always smiles. The documentary shows his difficulties in the dream of becoming a world champion and proving to everyone that if he can, you can!
tagline: A documentary about Freddy, a young Colombian surf talent, born with a malformation.
title: Freddy: Si yo puedo tú puedes
